name: Introduction to Psychology
description: Introduction to the study of psychology with an emphasis on its history, theories and research methods.

name: Introduction to Forensic Psychology
description: Introduction to the field of forensic psychology, including its history, legal systems, and ethical considerations.

name: Psychological Aspects of Criminal Behavior
description: Analysis of the psychological factors associated with criminal behavior, including mental health, personality, and social factors.

name: Forensic Psychology Research Methods
description: Exploration of the research methods used in forensic psychology, including survey design, interview techniques, and psychological assessment.

name: Forensic Psychology Practicum
description: Supervised fieldwork in forensic psychology, including practical application of research methods, interviewing, and assessment techniques.
